recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 425F. Remove and chop mushroom stems.

In a saucepan over medium heat, cook ground beef, onion, and garlic. Mix in chopped mushroom stems, 1 Tbsp butter, bread crumbs, salt, and pepper. Cook, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in cream.
Dip mushroom caps in 1/4 cup melted butter, and stuff generously with meat mixture. Arrange stuffed mushrooms in a baking dish. Sprinkle with chili powder.
